company.name: iAmStudio
company.description:
We are focused on providing nearshore software development services to U.S. and Canada-based clients. We also specialise in mobile apps, primarily for health care, construction, and the entertainment industry.

Our philosophy is to grow by building strong and sustainable relationships with
partners, clients, and teams. 

As a leader in the latest technology services in Colombia, we welcome the opportunity to be strategic partners for companies looking to develop a presence in Latin America.
